net.sourceforge.pmd.lang

Class AbstractParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.AbstractParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractJavaParser, ApexParser, CppParser, Ecmascript3Parser, JspParser, MatlabParser, ObjectiveCParser, PLSQLParser, PythonParser, VfParser, VmParser, XmlParser

    public abstract class AbstractParser
extends Object
implements Parser
    This is a generic implementation of the Parser interface.
